issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description
As of 3.3.0 SDK, the Ti.UI.iOS.AUTODETECT properties have been deprecated.
This can be replaced with Ti.UI.AUTOLINK, which is supported on both iOS and Android.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Add TextArea autoDetect for Android
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.9.4
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201407111535
Titanium SDK, build: 3.3.0.GA
Titanium CLI, build: 3.3.0
Alloy: 1.4.1
Android Device: Nexus 4 (4.4)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
